justsudoku

justsudoku

GTK+ Linux Sudoku game

Modules

  • BoardMethods and datatypes for creating and manipulating Sudoku Boards.
  • FlagDefines flags and option descriptions.
  • GUIMethods for creating a Sudoku GTK+ GUI.
  • MainHandles user input and controlling everything else.
  • MoveDefines valid Moves and MoveErrors for Sudoku application.
  • ParseMethods for parsing moves and for creating locations and squares.
  • Util
    • Util.OtherHopefully useful utility functions.
  • ViewWraps GUI in a module to interface with controller.

Produced by Haddock version 2.13.2
